sentences.en: According to Compendium of Materia Medica, garlic has antibacterial function that strengthens the body's immune system.
sentences.cn: 具杀菌作用.根据《本草纲目》, 大蒜含杀菌及增强抵抗力的作用.

sentences.en: Ancient encyclopaedia of China Compendium of Materia Medica.
sentences.cn: 中国古代的百科全书—《本草纲目》.

sentences.en: Compendium of Materia Medica, the food will be herbs, medicinal, drug Edible three categories.
sentences.cn: 在《本草纲目》中, 将草本植物分食用 、 药用 、 药食两用三类.

sentences.en: Instructions for using the tool can is find in the compendium.
sentences.cn: 在手册中可以找到这个工具的使用说明.

sentences.en: Li Shizhen is a famous scientist in China Ming Dynasty who is also the writer of Compendium of Materia Medica.
sentences.cn: 李时珍是中国明代著名的科学家《本草纲目》的作者。

sentences.en: London was " the biggest aggregation of human life - the most complete compendium of the world ".
sentences.cn: 伦敦是 “ 人文荟萃之区,全球最完备的缩影 ”.

sentences.en: The book is a compendium of their poetry, religion and philosophy.
sentences.cn: 这本书是他们诗歌 、 宗教和哲学的概略.

sentences.en: The Compendium of Materia Medica has been held in high esteem since it was first published.
sentences.cn: “本草纲目”问世之后,深受人们的推重.

sentences.en: The itinerary from north to south is a compendium of Norwegian nature.
sentences.cn: 从北到南可以领略到挪威自然的概貌.

sentences.en: The OECD's compendium also shows that graduate jobs fared better during the global recession.
sentences.cn: 报告还指出,全球经济衰退期间,大学毕业生的工作待遇相对较好一些.

sentences.en: The Roman Catholic Church has issued a compendium of its teachings.
sentences.cn: 天主教会已经颁布了其教义纲要。

sentences.en: This compendium of all the old Roman virtues died at an advanced age, respected and feared.
sentences.cn: 这个罗马的一切旧道德的结晶品享尽高龄后在受人敬畏中寿终.

sentences.en: This encyclopedia is truly a compendium of knowledge.
sentences.cn: 这部百科全书真正是知识宝库.

sentences.en: We observe the endless classical references in The Compendium of Ecclesiastical History written by Cotton Mather.
sentences.cn: 我们发现科顿·马瑟的《兰宗教史摘要》中,也用了无数典故.

sentences.en: Why should it be when it's in the Compendium of Laws.
sentences.cn: 那《法律纲要》里面为什么会有?

trans.tran_en: A compendium is a short but detailed collection of information, usually in a book
